block.jtmcraft.logic_gate_and.tooltip: If both inputs are high, then output is high
block.jtmcraft.logic_gate_nand.tooltip: If at least one input is low, then output is high
block.jtmcraft.logic_gate_or.tooltip: If at least one input is high, then output is high
block.jtmcraft.logic_gate_nor.tooltip: If both inputs are low, then output is high
block.jtmcraft.logic_gate_xor.tooltip: If inputs are different, then output is high
block.jtmcraft.logic_gate_nxor.tooltip: If inputs are the same, then output is high
item.jtmcraft.mining_tool.tooltip.shift: A multi-tool combination of an axe, pickaxe, and shovel.
painting.jtmcraft.jtmcraft.title: jtmcraft
painting.jtmcraft.jtmcraft.author: jtmcraft
